Description: Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Dalaran in the Broken Isles.

Description: Reduces an enemy's attack speed by 35%, increases casting time by 35% and slows its movement to 60% of normal for 5 sec.

Name: Curse of Night
Description: Burns the enemy for Arcane damage and inflicts additional damage over 12 sec.

Name: Arcane Force
Description: Illidan channels raw arcane force into his enemies.

Name: Moon Fall
Description: Moon Guard channel raw arcane force into their enemies.

Name: Stormrage
Description: Illidan leaps into the air and crashes down upon his enemies with deadly arcane force!

Name: Fury of the Cosmos
Description: Illidan unleashes the fury of the cosmos, disintegrating enemies in his path.

Name: Warhawk
Description: Illidan vaults backwards as he annihilates his enemies with a vicious arcane assault.

Name: Soul Barrier
Description:
Shield yourself for 8 sec, absorbing 306,101 damage. Consuming a Soul Fragment adds 51,016 to the shield.



Soul Barrier's absorption cannot be reduced below 40,813.



Consumes all Soul Fragments within 20 yds.

Name: Void Eruption
Description:
Releases an explosive blast of pure void energy, activating Voidform and causing 11,005 Shadow damage to all enemies afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain or Vampiric Touch.



During Voidform, this ability is replaced by Void Bolt.



Requires 100 Insanity to activate.
